news.title: Downtime for Sandia National Laboratories mirror

p.b: The Gentoo Linux source mirror at Sandia National Laboratories will be undergoing some maintenance next Tuesday, April 22nd.

body.p: The mirror will be down from approximately 8AM until 4PM Central Daylight Time. Users using this mirror should specify an alternate source in their GENTOO_MIRRORS variable stored in the /etc/make.conf file. A full list of download mirrors is available on our site.
